org.eclipse.jface.layout

Class LayoutConstants

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.jface.layout.LayoutConstants

  • public final class LayoutConstants
extends Object
    Contains various layout constants to be used in dialogs.
    Since:
    3.2
